level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90-day) addition of section, see ยง 222 of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-38
level.text: For Law 13-38, see notes following ยง 2-1205.01.
